item.description:
For ice skating we should plan to meet at 2:15 so everyone is set with skates etc...
Public Skating is from 2:40pm-4:40pm
Admission is $5 and Rentals are $4

MDC Ice Rink
1275 VFW Parkway
West Roxbury, MA 02123
Their number is 617-364-9188


We are also planning Karaoke at Napper Tandy's.

As usual enjoy some dinner or dessert and sing your hearts out!
Comfy casual pub with restaurant and bar, and friendly wait staff.
A wide variety of songs to choose from (over 80,000) and the awesome DJ Charlie.
Starts at 9pm

46 Day Street
Norwood, MA 02062
item.name: Ice Skating and Karaoke
